summary: PWA and offline-first functionality testing completed successfully. All 7 features tested and working: manifest.json served correctly (200), service-worker.js served correctly (200), offline indicator appears with pending sync items, offline indicator hidden on login/auth pages, service worker registers and caches app shell, session parts API works with offline queue support, manual sync trigger works when online.
passed_tests: PWA manifest.json served at /manifest.json with correct content-type (application/json)
Service worker served at /service-worker.js with correct content-type (application/javascript)
Service worker registers successfully on page load
PWA icons (192, 384, 512) served correctly with 200 status
Offline indicator hidden on login page (/login)
Offline indicator hidden on auth callback page (/auth/callback)
Offline indicator shows 'Synced' when online with no pending items
Offline indicator shows 'X pending' when items in sync queue
Offline indicator visible on authenticated pages (home, calendar)
Manual sync trigger works - clicking indicator syncs pending items
Sync queue stored in localStorage under 'mcd_sync_queue' key
Session parts API (/api/session-parts) returns data correctly
Session parts defaults API (/api/session-parts/defaults) returns default parts
Offline queue items sync successfully when online
SyncProvider initializes correctly with service worker registration
critical_code_review_comments: Background Sync API is disabled in test environment (expected - requires HTTPS and browser support)
Service worker registers twice on page load (minor - doesn't affect functionality)
seed_data_creation: Created test user and session for PWA testing - cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: PWA functionality is fully implemented and working. Service worker caches static assets on install. Offline indicator uses data-testid='offline-indicator' and appears in bottom right corner. Sync queue uses localStorage key 'mcd_sync_queue'. The app uses 'most recent edit wins' conflict resolution for offline data. Background Sync API may not work in all browsers but manual sync works correctly.
